long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automate customer support emails with Fiber AI — the ultimate AI-powered gmail assistant.

Fiber AI learns from your past customer support emails to create a personalized knowledge base for you. It then generates draft responses for incoming support emails, making your support team's life easier and reducing response time by 90%.

Fiber AI's Chrome extension features:
✅ One-click approvals: Approve draft responses with a single click, or edit them and let Fiber AI learn for future improvements.
✅ Continuous learning: Our AI gets smarter with every accepted or rejected draft, constantly updating your knowledge base.
✅ Seamless integrations: Use Fiber AI with Gmail in just 3 simple steps, and look forward to integrations with Intercom, Zendesk, Hubspot, Slack, and more!
✅ Works across all Chromium-based browsers, such as Chrome, Brave, and Edge.
✅ Supports multiple languages to cater to a diverse customer base.

Experience the power of AI-driven customer support and never answer the same question twice! Boost your support team's productivity with Fiber AI!

WEBSITE: https://www.fiber.ai/

PRODUCT DEMO: https://www.fiber.ai/demo

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
HOW TO USE ON GMAIL
1. Sign up at https://www.fiber.ai/sign-up
2. Connect your gmail account at https://www.fiber.ai/app/gmail
3. Download our Fiber AI Chrome Extension and link it to your Fiber account using https://www.fiber.ai/app/link
4. You're all set! Approve draft responses in Gmail with a single click, or edit them and let Fiber AI learn for future improvements.
